name: 數位系統
description: 本課程旨在介紹數位系統及設計與分析的概念, 讓學生認識用於數位系統設計及分析的現代化工具。
goals: 增進學生數位系統基本概念的理解
教育學生運用數位系統知識與能力
培養學生獨立思考數位系統設計與實作
培養學生對數位系統的興趣，進一步奠定學生終身學習之基礎
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】

This course provides a modern introduction to logic design and the basic building blocks used in digital systems, in particular digital computers. It starts with a discussion of combinational logic: logic gates, minimization techniques, arithmetic circuits, and modern logic devices such as field programmable logic gates. The second part of the course deals with sequential circuits: flip-flops, synthesis of sequential circuits, and case studies, including counters, registers, and random access memories. State machines will then be discussed and illustrated through case studies of more complex systems using programmable logic devices. Different representations including truth table, logic gate, timing diagram, switch representation, and state diagram will be discussed.

第一週: Introduction of digital system and the trend of its development

第二週: Binary Systems and binary numbers

第三週: Binary Systems and binary numbers

第四週: Gate-Level Minimization, boolean reduction

第五週: Gate-Level Minimization, k-map

第六週: Combinational Logic circuit design I

第七週: Combinational Logic circuit desogn II

第八週:期中考試

第九週: Synchronous Sequential Circuit: Latch and Flip Flop (D FF, JK FF, T FF)

第十週: Synchronous Sequential Circuit: State machine, state diagram, state transition table

第十一週: Synchronous Sequential Circuit design: State machine, Mealy machine and Moore machine

第十二週: Synchronous Sequential Circuit design: state machine minimization

第十三週: Registers and counters

第十四週: Memory and Programmable Logic

第十五週: Design at the register transfer level

第十六週:期末考試

第十七週: 彈性課程(專題報告)

第十八週: 彈性課程(專題報告)
